msg.msgText: The "{0}" command syntax is not valid.

msgExplanation.p: The object_type or configuration item is not valid for 'imaserver create' or 'imaserver update' command.

msgUserResponse.p: Run 'imaserver create help' or 'imaserver update help' command and ensure that proper object_type and required configuration items are specified. Also check for mis-matched double quotes.
